abstract: A reporter will discuss the challenges posed by increasingly globalized high-tech industries, based on a deep look inside the economics of Apple’s manufacturing.
snippet: A reporter will discuss the challenges posed by increasingly globalized high-tech industries, based on a deep look inside the economics of Apple’s manufacturing.
lead_paragraph: 7:36 p.m. | Updated  Charles Duhigg has provided answers to select reader questions. See the comments, below.

headline.main: Charles Duhigg Responds to Readers on Apple and the iEconomy
